caption: In a sprawling campsite, a man and a woman were engaged in conversation as they walked together. They spoke while making their way through the area.On a snow-covered mountain, a woman lay on the ground, appearing unwell, while a man attended to her. They embraced each other, lying on the ground, seemingly keeping each other warm.In a room, a young man received some news that left him deeply shocked. However, he was immediately restrained by someone nearby. Initially, he seemed inclined to take impulsive action, but after a heated argument, he agreed to hold off.In another setting, a man named Audi was being tended to by a girl.
